**9/30/2017**

 

Single Flavor Test: **2.5%** & **3.25%**

60/40 | 0 Nic | 40W | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton

 


‚ñ∫First Impressions (Both %'s | 20 min after mixing)

‚Ä¢ Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste

- Intense & Pleasant Realistic Taro Aroma | Mod. Sweet & Creamy | Mellow Root 
- Off Notes: None | *Hint of Butter  
- Base Taste Similar to Sweet Corn (HC).... 

__________________________________________________
**10/14/017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel 

‚Ä¢ Tester Bottle Aroma: @ 2.5% Unchanged from  9/30‚úì
Aroma Intensity - Strong | Earthy & Rooty Potato "Corn/Starch" Aroma

‚Ä¢ Knuckle: Sweet | Light Creaminess | Mod. Root & Potato "Starch" | Hint of Butter  | Similar"Corn (HC)" - Starch like base

‚Ä¢ Vape: Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mod. Earthy, Potato like Starch - Dominant | Med.Light Dairy & Butter - Submissive | Light Sweetness 
---| Full Rounded Body | Smooth & Semi Dry Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: No "Green"   |  Note of a "Macadamia" like Nut

--| Full Rounded Body | Smooth & Lightly Dry Mouth Feel
